attributes.action: Only allow the sale of silent fireworks.
attributes.additional_details: To create a more enjoyable way of celebration for the whole family. To enable us to take our pets to events where there are fireworks, and know that they aren't going to be petrified by the noise. It's heart breaking to watch our beloved animals in distress at certain times of the year.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of big bang fire works, And only sell silent fireworks. With the majority of the UK likely to have a house hold pet, more consideration needs to be given to them on evenings of significant celebrations

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
